thm wnefimgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 " c1)≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → c2))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, (c0 " c1)≠ ∅, (dom(c0)⋂ c1)≠ ∅)
  eqnetrd((dom(c0)⋂ c1), emptycls, c1, w0)
  sylib(w0, (dom(c0)⋂ c1)= c1, c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  syl5sseqr(c1, dom(c0), c1, w0)
  ssid(c1)

  sseqin2(c1, dom(c0))
  necon3bii((c0 " c1), emptycls, (dom(c0)⋂ c1), emptycls)
  imadisj(c0, c1)
